name: Do it for the Vine
description:
We are a team of 3 including:

Alexllama1 who worked on the majority of the programming

chill who worked on some of the programming, SFX and Music

and Maranta who worked on all of the Art in the game (and wrote this description!)

Our game may of had a few road bumps, but we are happy with the final result as this is our first proper game. If the story seems confusing to you, the original intention was to have you taking photos of your victims in pursuit of a thriving career on your favorite unnamed social media platform, but we ended up scrapping our idea at a point of no return, leaving our game in it's now dark state. We hope you enjoyed playing it as much as we enjoyed making it and thank you to Feldo for hosting!

Sorry that you can't play in the website. Itch and Godot didn't want to cooperate, definitely not my fault. - chill
